name: Legacy Flight Training, LLC
about: Legacy Flight Training, LLC is a specialized flight training center located at the Vero Beach airport terminal building. We focus on providing high-quality simulator and flight training specifically for owners and operators of Piper PA-46 piston and turboprop aircraft, including the Malibu, Meridian, and Mirage models. Our expert instructors offer tailored training programs to ensure safe and efficient operation of these complex aircraft. With a commitment to excellence and safety, Legacy Flight Training equips pilots with the skills and knowledge necessary to handle their aircraft confidently in various conditions. Our training environment is designed to simulate real-world scenarios, preparing pilots for the challenges of flying these advanced aircraft. Choose Legacy Flight Training for comprehensive and professional flight instruction.
